General.Name: Mountain & I Acquisition Co Corp Unit
General.Description: Mountain & Co. I Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities in consumer Internet and B2B digital infrastructure sectors. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.
General.Address: 4001 Kennett Pike, Wilmington, DE, United States, 19807
